title: Client counts down to 0 then hangs.  happens 3 times now I have deserter lock out 30m !!?
body:
So the everyone picks a champ and all and the game does the count down to 0 and then I see in chat everyone leaves.
but my client does not close and start the load screen.

I kill the client thinking Ill log in and it will load out to the match

But no the match didnt start so I que again (this is in like 2m afer closing the game)

Que again and get into another champ select and the same thing happens.

I do this three more time and the 4th time it locks me out for 30m saying I abandoned games.

WTF its your freaking client that is broken not me leaving a game.  WHY didnt it show the 5m one or the 15m one?

replies.body: When you enter champion select, the server groups everyone together into the same room.  It sounds like you're having a network issue that's causing you to lose sync and get left behind.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up.  This wouldn't be a client issue unless you have apps like play.tv running, which can cause crashes.  Hope that helps!
